name: Ext_R3_StructureDefinition_baseDefinition
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.StructureDefinition.baseDefinition for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents StructureDefinition.baseDefinition from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Definition that this type is constrained/specialized from
element.definition: An absolute URI that is the base structure from which this type is derived, either by specialization or constraint.
element.comment: `StructureDefinition.baseDefinition` maps to R4 `StructureDefinition.baseDefinition`. Target added uri:canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition) target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
